metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36763 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: EDK2 is susceptible to a vulnerability in the Tcg2MeasureGptTable()function, allowing a user to trigger a heap buffer overflow via a localnetwork. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may result in acompromise of confidentiality, integrity, and/or availability.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
